content.question: A major goal of the European Economic Community was to

choices.label: promote ethnic autonomy within the member countries
prevent the reassertion of German industrialism
achieve the industrialization of Africa and Latin America
stop labor migration within Western Europe
coordinate industrial and agricultural policies of the members

content.answer: coordinate industrial and agricultural policies of the members

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
